snippet: Some churches across the country are withdrawing their holdings from Bank of America and other banks implicated in the mortgage crisis and urging repentence.
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On religion column; dozens of clergy members and congregations in churches across the country have withdrawn their holdings from Bank of America and other banks implicated in the mortgage crisis as a protest against banks' role in mass foreclosures.
lead_paragraph: Some churches across the country are withdrawing their holdings from Bank of America and other banks implicated in the mortgage crisis and urging repentence.
